section.title: Version Section
section.para: This document contains no actual content, information, or other interesting material. In fact it is only here to serve one purpose and that is to store the chapterinfo the above sections that are being used by several other documents.
The following line is the code to be put into the document you wish to include the above version info in:
DateVer is the id we provided to be able to reference it.
All content herein is but a placeholder to maintain a valid document structure that we can use bookinfo/date and other elements for other purposes.
